text: Anumzamo'a huno, Mago zupa maka Israeli vahera zamavare atruma hanuana, osi'a naga'ma ofri mani'naza naga'a ana maka zamavare tru hugahue. Ana nehu'na sipisipi afu zagama keganafima zamavare atruma hazaza hu'na, zamavare atru hanuge'za manigahaze. Ana hanuge'za rama'a sipisipi afuzagamo'zama knare tra'zama me'nefi atru hu'za mani'neza zamagasasamoke'ma nehazaza hu'za manigahaze.
